l_main\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Video Portal\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is a convenient video and podcast content management platform for EPAM employees and our customers. You can find useful materials for training and development, get to know the company better, and obtain help with work issues.  After all, video and audio content is created by experts we can learn something from. If you plan to share your experience with fellow EPAMers – you can do so easily with Video Portal. Video Portal will take care of hosting and analytics collection about the usage of your content:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":16342,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/97a6a1e6-1e15-4f33-a0be-5cf4afe69d23/video1.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/97a6a1e6-1e15-4f33-a0be-5cf4afe69d23/video1.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"video1.png\",\"name\":\"video1.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"wildcardType\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"97a6a1e6-1e15-4f33-a0be-5cf4afe69d23\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":480,\"height\":267},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To learn more, check out \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://epa.ms/2dTbLv\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"this article\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What content is on Video Portal, and how do I find it?\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Video\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Video Portal has over 40,000 videos and the number is constantly growing. Everybody will find something to their taste and there is a wide range of topics covered: technologies, programming languages, communication skills, self-presentation, travel, health etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To specify your search more, try using filters like language, tags, video length, and other parameters that will narrow down your search and help find the most relevant content. The video can be liked, downloaded or added to Watch later.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"To stay updated, make use of subscriptions to channels. professionally.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rHere you can find communities on sports, music, movies,
